Nightlight:

Nightlight screamed scared at time that she moved backwards and  
fired an blue energy ball against Vampirtron. She wans't sure if that 
would be enough to stun him


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> As the Vampirtron jumped at Nightlight, the Maximal Commander 
reacted quickly. He jumped at between them at Vampirtron. He was 
attempting to tackle Vampirtron to the ground.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: DONT TOUCH HER!!!
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Lestat Lioncourt 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Saturday, August 17, 2002 6:22 AM
>   Subject: Re: Artifact 1
> 
> 
>   (I'm gonna be gone for the next 4 days, so basically, you can do 
whatever experiments you want on Vampirtron, as long as they don't 
alter him too much...) 
> 
>   Vampirtron: 
> 
>        He was fully aware of all that happened, hyperkeenly too. 
Time had seemed to slow for him. 
> 
>        "No more time left in the world...I need to FEED!!!" He 
yelled, then seemed to pass out. On instinct programming he 
transformed into robot mode, and lied there, unmoving, eyes shut. 
There were no more energon surges going through him, but he seemed 
quite dead. 
> 
>        That's when the hunger took over, his eyes whipped open, to 
reveal a new colour. His optics, which were normally light blue, had 
turned a frightening blood red. The colour almost illuminated the 
room. When Vampirtron spole, it was with a slight modification to his 
vocal center, his voice was deeper and almost seemed to echo. 
> 
>        "Activating Mayfair Recording," He said, in a very flat 
tone. Then his voice picked up emotions that weren't his own, "Ahh, 
greetings," He said in a chipper voice, "I see you have found my pet. 
Well, isn't this a golden opportunity? I think it is. What can I tell 
you about Experiment 666? Well, he has no spark for one, but 
ironically, one of the most compasionate transformers I've ever met. 
How does he stay alive? Well, he feeds on other transformers. How 
does he make this process happen? Well, if this recording has been 
activated, I think you're all going to get a personal demonstration." 
Vampirtron sat unmoving still, "End of Mayfair Recording." 
> 
>        Vampirtron sat still for a few more seconds, but then leaped 
up towards the nearest person, Nightlight. He opened his mouth wide 
in midair, and huge canine teeth extended, with little drills at the 
end. His claws extended and he reached out to grab her... 
> 
>    RoboRick007 wrote: 
> 
>     : :  Rodimus Prime : :
> 
>     Rodimus Prime: Ok, just tell me what you need when you need it. 
I want to see Vampirtron not in pain.
>       ----- Original Message ----- 
>       From: airly2000 
>       To: nbwrpg@y... 
>       Sent: Saturday, August 17, 2002 2:01 AM
>       Subject: Re: Artifact 1
> 
> 
>       Nightlight::
> 
>       Nighlight looked to Rodimus and said "it seems that all it's 
all 
>       right, but perhaps we might need a hand"
> 
> 
> 
> 
>       --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
>       > : : Rodimus Prime : :
>       > 
>       > Rodimus walks into the med room where Nightlight and 
Vampirtron are.
>       >
